entry.title: Python Monthly Mar 2017 - Getting Your Python Project Open Source Ready
entry.summary: This month we discuss licensing, documentation, and testing. Jay has been working on something that he would love to share with the world. He is working with Kenneth to get it open source ready.
entry.content: This month we discuss licensing, documentation, and testing. Jay has been working on something that he would love to share with the world. He is working with Kenneth to get it open source ready.

entry.title: Python Monthly October 2016
entry.summary:
Streamed live on Oct 6, 2016 Our first monthly Python Monthly meeting

Welcome to the first session of the Python Monthly (formerly python thursday!) This week we talk about what is Python Monthly, how to get involved and lastly OUR FIRST PROJECT!
entry.content:
